quest.name: Knocking the Knockers
journal:
 Quest Sync
Gratt is seething with fury.
objectives: Weaken Gulg knockers, then capture them with coils of wire.
Deliver the captured knockers to Gratt.

dialogue.name: GRATT
dialogue.text: I've just about bloody had it! No more! I'll not stand by and see another theft go unanswered!

dialogue.name: GRATT
dialogue.text: Eh? What am I angry about!? Well, it's them blasted knockers, ain't it!

dialogue.name: GRATT
dialogue.text: Those grabby bastards latch onto anything─ore, hammers, my favorite bloody pick─and drag it back to their nests! And what for, I ask you!? The little buggers don't even have the concept of value!

dialogue.name: GRATT
dialogue.text: I swear there'll be no end to this until I teach 'em the error of their ways. Here's the deal, friend: help me catch some of those thieving pests, and I'll see you paid for the trouble. You in?

dialogue.name: GRATT
dialogue.text: Good. I'll be going south, so you head east until you find a couple of knockers to knock about. Once they're reeling, use this wire to bind those wriggling limbs of theirs, then bring them back here to the village.

dialogue.name: GRATT
dialogue.text: Take that wire, and snare me a couple of knockers! There's a nest of the sneaky blighters over to the east!

dialogue.name: GRATT
dialogue.text: Back already, eh? I managed to catch a few myself, but let's see your haul.

dialogue.name: GRATT
dialogue.text: If I'm being honest, I was worried that an outsidera dwarf unfamiliar with the area might walk herselfhimself straight into a pack of hungry iguanas. Glad you proved me wrong!

dialogue.name: GRATT
dialogue.text: ...Now, my prehensile pretties! Uncle Gratt is going to teach you to stop stealing ore from the Tholls...and start nicking it from the Goggs instead! Mwahahaha!
